title: Capsulesbed.com Now Redefines Accommodation with Futuristically Engineered Capsule Hotel Bed
text:
In a world where hotels and dormitories in populated areas are hard to find, Capsulesbed.com silently started a revolution with its modish and all-inclusive hotel beds recently. The new capsule hotel beds and youth hostel beds are competitive products which will help them increase their market share.
(PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Capsulesbed.com silently started a revolution with its modish and all-inclusive hotel beds recently. The 21st century has seen the birth of countless technological wonders that have changed lives forever. The latest addition to the laundry list of technological innovations is probably capsule hotel bed , a groundbreaking idea that has been nourished and materialized by China based Capsulesbed.com. The small compartmentalized hotels that the company manufactures in its Guangzhou based manufactory are gradually catching on. The owners of the company confirmed that their primary customers are students who relocate to other cities for studying and internship, kindergarten schools that have crèche and baby-sitting facilities, organizations with restrooms and the likes.
In short, the demand for capsule and even youth hostel beds is steadily increasing across disparate sectors, which in a way, is surely redefining the idea of staying in a hotel or having a one-night stand outdoors for some urgent reason. Gen-X people simply love these sci-fi inspired small but durable hotel beds that can be dismantled into parts like high quality PVC bed plate, fire alarm, fire extinguisher, mirrors, lights, TV and mattress, surge protector and SOS button, all of which are held to one’s liking. From ensuring safety to considering the latest in fashion and technology, these beds are no less than wonder houses for most.
Capsulesbed.com has left no stone unturned in procuring the best of materials including cutting-edge layout patterns and advanced decoration ideas like graphics that has upped the beds by several standards. Besides, the one year warranty period and lifetime maintenance are few other add-ons worthy of appreciation.
As per a company insider, “Our capsule beds are among the best in the industry. Aside offering the needful, our unit takes the initiative to train interested customers at our factory for installation purposes. For those who don’t wish to avail the training, our technicians are always at the disposal of them and help with their invaluable advice. Everything from packaging to facilities are bound to appeal to beginners and also those used to this innovative concept. All that you need to do is make a visit once and keep coming back for more. We assure you won’t be disappointed."
About the Company
Capsulesbed.com is one of the leading platforms in offering hotel equipments that are no less than miracle alternatives for multifarious hotel types.
